programme.title: STEMsasi! Ep11
programme.desc: Bagaimana cahaya terbentuk dan apakah sifat-sifat cahaya? Selain sebagai keperluanasas, bagaimana pula cahaya berfungsi dalam bidang sains dan seni?

programme.title: STEMsasi! Ep12
programme.desc: Mengapa cuaca terlalu panas dan adakalanya terlalu sejuk? Ada juga hujan yangmenyebabkan sesetengah kawasan banjir. Apa yang dimaksudkan dengan pemanasanglobal?

programme.title: Geng Gajet Ep06
programme.desc: The store is not doing well - and the Geng decides to design & build an online store that becomes a success!

programme.title: Sains Comot S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Eksperimen sains bukan saja seronok tetapi comot bersama Prof Comot! Layari www.astro.com.my/sainscomot untuk maklumat tambahan mengenai Sains Comot.

programme.title: Ragam Sekolah Ep02
programme.desc: Siri mini istimewa sempena Hari Guru ini mengisahkan tentang ragam dan gelagat guru di sekolah, yang pasti membuat anak-anak dan ibu bapa tercuit hati.

programme.title: Planet TVIQ (Dec 2010) Ep61
programme.desc: Sertai rakan-rakan Planet TVIQ anda dan berlibur dengan mereka sepanjang cuti sekolah ini./Join your Planet TVIQ buddies brewing up activities for fun-filled holidays!

programme.title: Supersains Ep10
programme.desc: Selamat Tinggal Profesor - Ikom yang selama ini cuba dihidupkan akhirnya dapat berfungsi melalui sebuah cip yang terdapat dalam sebuah kotak misteri. Dapatkah Profesor kembali ke masa hadapan?

programme.title: Sains Comot S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Lupakan program yang membosankan dan hambar, kerana Sains Comot adalah sebuah program yang berwarna-warni, comot, menyeronokkan, banyak fakta berguna dan menarik.

programme.title: Dekoded Ep10
programme.desc: Pernah tak anda lalui situasi ini: anda sudah selesa di atas katil, sedia untuk tidur tapi lampu masih bernyala dan terasa amat malas untuk bangun semula hanya untuk menutupnya?

programme.title: Dekoded Ep11
programme.desc: Alston telah mencipta sebuah alat peranti yang membolehkan sesiapa untuk menutup peralatan elektrik dari jarak jauh. Bagaimana dia melakukannya?

programme.title: Dekoded Ep12
programme.desc: Untuk episod kali ini, kita bertemu bersama Lu Shern, seorang pencipta cerdik yang telah mencipta mesin pencetak 3D nya sendiri.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep01

programme.desc: Section A of Paper 2: Questions 1-15. A set of sample questions and answers are discussed to highlight pattern of grammar structures, point out common errors and many more.

programme.desc: Mr Bean needs a new spade but why buy one when you can win one!

programme.desc: Kingdom Force must caravan honey bees between kingdoms to save an endangered flower, but end up endangering the bees when Luka decides to put on a show for Liberty's viewers.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep33
programme.desc: Robin's perfect sandwich is missing and he will stop at nothing to find it.

programme.title: Running Man Animation Ep33

programme.desc: Charlie adopts baby snakes despite the Bears thinking he's not ready for parenthood.

programme.title: Ninjago Ep01

programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is missing, and it's up to the Titans to find him before Easter is ruined.

programme.desc: For Panda's Birthday, the Bears try to help Panda meet his favorite K-Pop band, Monsta X.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Ep175
programme.desc: Richard Watterson seems supernaturally attached to his old refrigerator.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep157
programme.desc: After Blossom and Buttercup break Schedulebot, they'll do anything to keep the truth from coming out.

programme.title: Running Man Animation Ep13
programme.desc: The Running Men return to the maze, and this time, the game is card flipping! To team up with the Beast of Steel, Lonky intentionally follows him onto the mini game stage.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep256
programme.desc: So she isn't left out of inside jokes, the Titans time travel to past adventures and insert Bumblebee into their memories.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep253
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen don't want to go to the CD Library. Once Team Tennyson is there, Lord Decibel traps them inside and demands a ransom.

programme.title: We Bare Bears Ep108
programme.desc: The Bears use a robot-bear to help around the house. But things get tricky when they lose control of the robot.

programme.title: Monster Beach Ep123
programme.desc: When Mutt's resistance to Brainfreeze's full moon party coincides with an increase in werewolf sightings, Jan and Dean become suspicious. But the truth is even weirder.

programme.title: Power Players Ep115
programme.desc: Axel is at the center of a disagreement between Sarge and Masko over what's more important in battle - the weapon or the one who wields it - after Dynamo bonds the trio together!

programme.title: Steven Universe Ep42
programme.desc: A garage sale reunites Greg and Amethyst with their favorite cheesy sitcom - Lil' Butler.

programme.title: Adventure Time Ep66
programme.desc: Jake is sick and tired of Finn using his body as a suit of armour, so he convinces Finn to trade places to show him how much it really stinks.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: The story of the Shaolin Temple's betrayal by the White-Browed Hermit and Shaolin hothead Fong Sai-yuk's revenge bid gets retold again.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: When Fang returns from the U.S. to see Rose but starts eyeing her old friend's fiance, Rose shows that she has a thorny side.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: Shu Pei-pei shines in this production alongside hero Yueh Hua, her stalwart companion, in a battle to rid their town of killers and thieves.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Directed by the legendary Chang Cheh, this rousing tale presents a fictional account of the famous Italian explorer's adventures.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: In this retelling of China's most popular romance, superstar Ivy Ling Po plays a scholar who tries to seduce a servant.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: Actress Lily Ho plays the feared swordswoman Silver Fox, who witnessed her father senseless maiming and her mother's rape. 18 years later, it's payback time.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is delightful in this 'cosmic comedy', about a murdered police inspector who returns to scare a crafty cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: A sword-master turned umbrella-maker goes up against a zombie-maker with a 'finger of doom' in this critically acclaimed film.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Serio-comic clashes of cultures ensue when a Mainland Chinese family try to make a go of it in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Kid With a Tattoo
programme.desc: Starring kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu on a mission of justice, this film is kicked into high gear by Yuen Hua, Yuan Pin and the villainous Wang Lung-wei.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: Cheng Pei Pei stars as Hsiao-Yun, a young singer struggling to juggle her career and her relationship with her pianist lover.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Screen idol Derek Yee is the ambitious 'Meteor' master who becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and goes on a selfish rampage of violence and sex.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This comedy contains dramatisations of some of the funniest and most surreal film gossips of director Li Han-Hsiang's 30 year career.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong pairs up with a new partner, Cecilia So, in this film after breaking up with Stephy Tang. Will this spark new life into director Patrick Kong's love series, or spoil the love mythology?

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: When Dave, a cop, saves the life of a gang leader, he has no idea that the man will continue his violent reign. An attempt to stop them unleashes a demon.

programme.title: Battle of Memories
programme.desc: A novelist decides to have memories of his ex-wife deleted following a painful divorce. However, a new quest begins when a glitch in the procedure leaves him with a killer's memories instead.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 3
programme.desc: Karen Mok reprises her iconic character after two decades in this tale of a girl who tries to redirect fate to ensure she & her true love stay alive.

programme.title: Call of Heroes

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom-To-Be
programme.desc: Carmen, who works at a PR company, has no intention of having children and is enjoying married life. Yet, what happens when she suddenly finds herself pregnant?

programme.title: A Witness Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: In this whodunit, a bumbling detective must rely on his only witness - a parrot, to help him catch the killer of an armed robber.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: A young emperor & his cross-dressing sister, and a restaurant-owning wanderer & his sibling descends into a swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics & romance.

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: To escape a love affair gone bad, Yanny heads to San Jose to visit an old friend, Ling, and her husband. But what seems an ideal, carefree existence hides some unspeakable secrets.

programme.title: As the Light Goes Out
programme.desc: When a liquor warehouse fire threatens to plunge the whole of Hong Kong into darkness upon reaching a nearby power plant, can firefighters avert this disaster?

programme.title: The First 48 S1 Ep01
programme.desc: When two young men are shot and killed in a car, Gwinnett County Homicide must turn to the survivors to learn the truth about what led to the shooting.

programme.title: Marcia Clark Investigates S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Marcia Clark examines the death of Rebecca Zahau, who was found tied and hanging outside her boyfriend's seaside mansion, and tries to find out whether it was a suicide or a murder.

programme.title: Hoarders S11 Ep05
programme.desc: For 18 years John refused to let anyone into his house. Recently he finally asked his daughters for help. John's extreme hoard, rat infestation and mounting citations from the city is too much to handle.

programme.title: Killer Kids S3 Ep40
programme.desc: A teenager experiencing early onset schizophrenia decides that it is his mission to kill everyone in the world, starting with his best friend.

programme.title: See No Evil S5 Ep14
programme.desc: On April 28th, 2010, police receive two frantic 911 calls. 12-year-old Alajawan Brown has been gunned down outside a 7-Eleven store, moments after another shooting took place only a block away.

programme.title: Escaping Polygamy S3 Ep29
programme.desc: The daughter of FLDS prophet Warren Jeffs reaches out to Jessica and Amanda for their help in rescuing her sister. Ava, a former Kingston clan member, fights to sever ties with her polygamous parents.

programme.title: Deadly Wives S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a fire erupts at the apartment complex, and several people are killed in the inferno. An investigation begins but some aspects of the disastrous incident just don't add up.

programme.desc: Three cases from The First 48 archives that took place in broad daylight are featured. In New Orleans, a night out ends in a deadly morning after a random encounter.

programme.title: Intervention S16 Ep02
programme.desc: As a committed mother, Sandra was involved in her kids' school activities as well as after school sports. But in 2015, her abuse of prescription pills after an injury led to an opioid and heroin addiction.

programme.title: Killer Kids S3 Ep40
programme.desc: A teenager experiencing early onset schizophrenia decides that it is his mission to kill everyone in the world, starting with his best friend.

programme.title: Border Security S7 Ep17

programme.desc: The Crow-mod finally makes a run for the list, facing the world famous Farmtruck for #10. Reaper and Shane battle while new lister Jeremy must face Dominator.

programme.desc: Ash and JD throw down at the drag strip with dueling Corvettes bought at auction.

programme.title: Dukes of Haggle S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Robert barters for a rare rodeo sign but discovers it's stolen property.

programme.title: Garage Squad S7 Ep02
programme.desc: Two workhorse Chevy beasts need a lot of work to get on their feet.

programme.title: Overhaulin' S8 Ep06
programme.desc: As a member of the LAPD Scott is always looking out for his community. However he hasn't been able to give his '63 Cadillac the same attention.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S9 Ep15
programme.desc: Wayne's always dreamed of owning an iconic Auburn Boattail Speedster. A twist of fate connects him with 2 sisters selling their grandfather's collection.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S9 Ep16
programme.desc: Wayne's been contacted by the New York Governor's office to refresh a '32 Packard originally purchased by Franklin Delano Roosevelt.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S7 Ep09
programme.desc: The girls take two Indian Scout Bobber motorcycles and build one with attitude and one with performance.

programme.desc: A father dedicates a Mustang rebuild to his daughter.

programme.desc: Richard has invited his friends Farmtruck and Azn from 'Street Outlaws' to check out his favorite viral videos.

programme.desc: Ian moves weight around on a Samurai to get more squat in the rear end.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S7 Ep16

programme.desc: Joe gets his hands on a sweet '67 Chevy Nova, and the crew has some mods in store that hit harder than a Lone Star Linebacker. But all great work comes at a cost.

programme.desc: The girls will show you how to retro fit a custom Power Steering setup on a jeep that never had power steering.

programme.desc: Joe can hardly believe his luck when he finds a pristine '62 Impala owned by a customer who wants to cut it up, strip it back, and add more horses than a TX ranch.

programme.desc: Dave turns a client's outdated '53 Chevy into a modern badass hot rod

programme.desc: Jim and Nancy James challenge a wannabe off grid couple, and Jennifer Hawks tries to find a missing settler. Meanwhile, the freight struggles to deliver a heavy load.

programme.desc: Flames are flying as fireworks explode and a fire department training exercise goes wrong. Also, A drone hits a groom in the face.

programme.desc: Variety is the spice of life and the Car Sharks know they'll find it at the auction.

programme.desc: The owner of a Malibu Wagon is not shy about driving his car fast. He just needs some help with the steering setup before his next race day.

programme.desc: With cooperation from friends and family, Overhaulin' swipes these cars to give them a complete, high-speed makeover

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: One family is put to the test during a 12-hour period where crime is made legal and emergency services are suspended.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep907
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: A pair of newlyweds finds their blissful peace shattered by the groom's best friend who overstays his welcome.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: A competition will be held between three schools of wizardry. The Goblet of Fire makes its final selection for the competition - Harry Potter.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! And The Curse Of The 13Th Ghost
programme.desc: Mystery Inc. heads for the icy slopes of the Himalayan mountains, chilling car chases, crystal balls and spine-tingling spells in this terrifyingly fun original movie!

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady is a hit with the A-list clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for one of their ex-boyfriends.

programme.title: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
programme.desc: Nancy is asked to help solve the ghostly activity in the Twin Elms mansion.

programme.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
programme.desc: When a young girl is sold to a geisha house, she embarks on a lifelong journey which sees her blossoming into the legendary geisha, Sayuri.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Christian Bale stars as John Connor, the man fated to lead the human resistance against Skynet and its army of Terminators.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A young wheeler-dealer's life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother. Stars Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: When the son of a mafia shark boss is accidentally killed, his vegetarian brother and a fast talking little fish decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

programme.title: The Rhythm Section
programme.desc: When an ordinary woman on a path of self-destruction discovers that the plane crash that killed her family was not an accident, she enters a dark, complex world to seek revenge and find her own redemption.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: The peaceful life of a former CIA agent is interrupted when an assassin shows up, intent on killing him.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: The life of an anonymous assassin takes an unexpected turn when he travels to Thailand to complete a series of contract killings.

programme.title: House Hunters S113 Ep04
programme.desc: He's an architect and wants an urban fixer-upper, but she wants a move-in ready house in the 'burbs with huge yard for their daughter.

programme.desc: DIYers are tackling projects to pass the time and posting their hilariously failed results on social media.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Just as Drew and Jonathan begin renovating a couple's home, a tree falls on the property and demolishes the upper floor.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Tamara tackles a 1905 Colonial with seven sun porches!

programme.title: Bargain Mansions S2 Ep08
programme.desc: In the second phase of Tamara's 1905 Colonial renovation, she creates a 900-square-foot master suite and converts a sun porch into a closet.

programme.title: Beach Hunters S1 Ep09
programme.desc: A family of four wants to add water and sand to their Texas life by trading in their busy schedules for a beach house on the coastal islands of Galveston.

programme.title: Beach Hunters S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Newlyweds are on a mission to relocate from cold and snowy Chicago to sunny and sandy Florida.

programme.title: Beach Hunters S1 Ep11
programme.desc: After many years of renting in Perdido Key, Florida, a Georgia couple can finally afford their dream home in this relaxing haven on the Gulf of Mexico.
